title: Ranked Champ Select bug
body:
I was in a ranked champ select and i was the first one to ban, to my surprise there was no champions to ban. I couldn't select any champion so i couldn't lock in or pick one, in the small time available I cleared the search bar seeing if i may of type something in there, again there was no champions to pick and lock in. I tried to use the role button and still no luck... I'm pretty sure i wasn't lagging as I could send messages to people in the lobby.

If someone could explain what might of happened that would be grateful, in the mean time I'm not going to risk my LP in case of another glitch/bug like this one.
